description: Always freeze. No error or Force Quit message, just stop working for seconds: cant scroll, cant click, ...etc. After close and reopen the app, lost all added feed/data. Best self-destructive app ever.
summary: Stop to thinking, and forgot all your source

description: It has a clean interface and articles are shown in html
Feeds is simple, easy to use, and sports great design.
summary: One of the better RSS apps out there

description: Please Fix it, it's not working on fedora 30.
The Flatpak doesn't support my hidpi screen very well, so the cursor is terribly tiny. Basic functionality is there, it looks great, and I want to use it, but I can't until the cursor is fixed.

Nothing special, it works. Can't customise feed name so it's a little messy depending on the website.

Reader view is under a dropdown with 2 clicks; would be better if it was a button to toggle in 1 click.
Does exactly what you want, and nothing more :+1

It's really easy to get going as it supports OPML import (and export). The interface is clean and organized. It loads web pages by default, there's even an option to go straight to reader view. That saves me some clicks and makes my reading experience way smoother. Thank you!

2 things:

 - It rocks a dark mode for reading articles, but not for the main app itself
- A nice feature would be to auto check for feeds from specified time to time. Right now only at startup, which takes ages to do the checking. I have to open the app and go take a coffee ( and i don't even have 10 feeds there).

other than that, i like the app
summary: No dark mode for main app

description: does what it's supposed to do. the integrated browser is nice and importing opml files is good to see.
The UI is great though I tried to import LineageOS and GIthub feeds and they didn't work at all. The LineageOS one didn't show up and the GIthub one only rendered the profile pictures.
summary: Nice UI but didn't work for me

description: Clean, intuitive, fast. The reader mode is absolutely brilliant.
That makes it useless to me
has all basic functionality needed. focus should be on keeping it updated to use latest technologies (eg gtk4) and fix bugs/crashes.
Daily usage is very easy
It has a simple and easy to use UI, remains fairly stable even with a lot of feeds. The WebView works well enough for reading articles.
summary: Works well and does what it says

description:
Simple and the reader mode is wonderful 
Import / Export OPML is super easy
Thank you
Looks nice at first glance. But says I'm offline when I'm not. And it doesn't respond to changes in my GTK theme settings.
Great upgrade and port to gtk4 and adwaita. It works great and keeps the feel of the new Gnome 42. Great and simple piece of software (at it should be)
I love how simple this app is, and yet it provides a combination of features that no other app seems to provide. It just works.
summary: Amazing Experience both on desktop and on mobile

description: Can't read any article while dark mode off.
summary: Can't read any article while dark mode off

description:
great app but please add support for feed folders
ui looks consistent with rest of GNOME
would recomend

Beautiful. 
The feeds are laid out quite nicely in a readable fashion. I have been trying to achieve this "look" by endless tweaking of other RSS feeders. 

Definitely what an RSS feeder should look like in this day and age
It is not even possible to import a URL.
summary: App does not work at all

description: Exactly what I was looking for. Works great.
List shows the full headlines in a compact fashion to get an overview at a glance. Possibility to view the article as the feed content, webpage or in "reader mode".
esta bien, sencilla, muy facil de usar, con buenas opciones de actualización, solo me gustaría poder añadir etiquetas y organizar mejor todo. sigan mejorando! de 10!
summary: Bien, pero un poco limitada en la organización

description: Probando la aplicación y mi primera impresión es que es sencilla pero con lo necesario y hasta el momento me gusta.
L'intégration avec GNOME est très bonne. L'application récupère le contenu des articles pour les flux qui n'en contiennent qu'un résumé.
Très bonne intégration avec l'écosystème GNOME. Il manque simplement un petit raccourci clavier permettant de naviguer vers l'article non-lu le plus vieux.
Application de flux rss mal conçut, lente et pleines de bug. A déconseiller
summary: lent, bugger, erreur lors des actualisation de flux, mal conçut

description: Простое и удобное приложение. Несколько режимов просмотра. Иногда может отвалиться какой-нибудь канал, да и уведомления не очень-то работают, но из всех ридеров на флетхабе выбираю именно этот
summary: Бывают ошибочки, но в целом - годится

description: Вниманию автора! Приложение в формате Flatpak не запускается на Fedora 35. Прошу исправить.
